state_priority_groups.rationale: These states have the largest populations and therefore the most nurses, making them high priority.
These states have medium-sized populations and represent a second tier priority.
These states have smaller populations but still require complete coverage.
U.S. territories also have nursing CE requirements that should be documented.

nursing_license_types.rationale: Includes multiple specialties with specific requirements
Subset of APRN with prescriptive authority and specific requirements
Specialized APRN role with specific requirements
Specialized APRN role with specific requirements
Specialized APRN role with specific requirements

recommended_processing_order: Complete all RN requirements for High Population States
Complete all LPN/LVN requirements for High Population States
Complete all APRN requirements for High Population States
Complete all RN requirements for Medium Population States
Complete all LPN/LVN requirements for Medium Population States
Complete all APRN requirements for Medium Population States
Complete all RN requirements for Lower Population States
Complete all LPN/LVN requirements for Lower Population States
Complete all APRN requirements for Lower Population States
Complete all nursing requirements for Territories
